subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
Establishment of the IAB Slovakia (called as Association of Internet Media until 2011) was based on the necessity to create a platform to be served for mutual communication among the subjects running their business in the area of Internet advertising with the association setting the following targets: Standardization of ethical and legal rules of Internet advertising; Supporting the development of the Internet as an advertising medium; Contribute to professionalization of Internetas an advertising medium through providing of single source data related to audience measurement and socio-demographic profile of Internet media; Providing research using the Internet as an advertising medium, guarantee the implementation of such studies and use of rights of ownership and distribution of the results of these studies; Exchange of experiences between members of the association as well as with third parties; Ensure the professionalism of members of the association and the services they provide in accordance with the adopted documents of the association; Organizing training courses, seminars and conferences to exchange experience and knowledge; Promotional and publishing activities in the area of online advertising; Business and commercial activities related to the provision of purpose; 
Gathering resources and activities of members of the association for the purpose of achieving the objects of the association; Mediate and liaise with other professional organizations and associations in online advertising area or with state and local entities.
